short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrape Product and Seller data from Depop, then export to CSV, Excel, JSON, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Depop Data Extractor & Downloader - Export Product & User Data to CSV/Excel/JSON/XML/HTML/TXT

Overview:
This Depop data extraction tool enables you to automatically download and convert product listings, user profiles, and social data into multiple formats including CSV, Excel, and JSON. Our scraper extracts detailed information from search results, product pages, and user profiles, making it the perfect tool for marketers, resellers, and fashion enthusiasts.

Key Features:
✓ Extract data from search results, product listings, user profiles, and social interactions
✓ Export to multiple formats: CSV, Excel (XLSX), JSON, XML, HTML, TXT
✓ Automatic pagination and data collection
✓ Comprehensive user data extraction including followers, following, and likes
✓ Advanced search result filtering and sorting

What Data You Can Extract:
• Product Listings
- Item details and pricing
- Product descriptions and conditions
- Seller information

• User Profiles
- Profile statistics
- Listing history
- Reviews and ratings

• Social Data
- Followers and following lists
- User likes
- Chat history and conversations

Perfect For:
Market Research: Track trending items and pricing strategies
Resellers: Monitor competitor listings and pricing
Fashion Trends: Analyze popular styles and brands across the platform

Export Format Support:
• CSV - Perfect for spreadsheet analysis
• Excel (XLSX) - Formatted with proper data types
• JSON - Ideal for developers
• XML - Structured data export
• HTML - Web-ready Table format
• TXT - Simple text output

Known Limitations:
Rate limits apply for non-Premium users
Requires user authentication

Technical Support:
Need assistance? Contact us: hello@nifty.codes
Feature requests & bug reports available through support channels

Privacy & Security:
Your login credentials are required to use this extension but are kept strictly confidential and never disclosed to third parties.
Exported data is formatted on our servers and never stored.
